course_description: This course focuses on the application of principles and techniques to practice extracorporeal circulation and selective perfusion techniques for special populations. Students will be expected to demonstrate competencies in simulation to transition to a participatory role in the operating room.
prerequisites: CVP 566 prerequisite and CVP 583 co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Student must enroll in CVP 583 first.
